channel.title: Different Hoster Coder? How it work?
channel.description:
Okay dont know how to put this, but I see people say that they need:
-Hosters -Coders -Testers
And all that. How can they have different pcs doing it? Cos when the coder updates the server it is not going to save on the Hosters one is it not? If you know what im getting at please reply, im confusing my self here writing this.
Thanks :cool:

item.title: Different Hoster Coder? How it work?
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

The one who is hosting sends the server to about 3 people and they send back what they added and he adds it. Simple as that.

Read full topic
item.source: Different Hoster Coder? How it work?
